species.name: wobbuffet
descriptions: If two or more Wobbuffet meet, they will turn competitive and try to outdo each other’s endurance. However, they may try to see which one can endure the longest without food. Trainers need to beware of this habit.
In order to conceal its black tail, it lives in a dark cave and only moves about at night.
It desperately tries to keep its black tail hidden. It is said to be proof the tail hides a secret.
It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to build up its counterstrike.
To keep its pitch- black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

abilities.name: shadow-tag
abilities.effect: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.

abilities.name: telepathy
abilities.effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.
